article_metadata.author: Margot Sanger-Katz

twitter.description: George E. Pataki called Medicaid expansion under the Affordable Care Act a poor choice for states because the “money the government is giving to you is going to be taken away after just a couple of years.” While it’s true that federal funding for Medicaid will decline slightly in future years, under the law, the […]
